data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier signals a Marseille throw-in in Amiens's half.
Throw-in for Marseille close to the penalty box.
Marseille's Kevin Strootman misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Marseille.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Amiens are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Amiens in their own half.
Can Amiens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Amiens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured [36].
Marseille's [36] looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Francois Letexier awards Amiens a goal kick.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Amiens.
Throw-in for Amiens in the half of Marseille.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Throw-in Amiens.
Amiens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Amiens close to the penalty box.
Jordan Amavi (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Francois Letexier.
Francois Letexier waits before resuming play because [36] for [37] is still down.
Corner awarded to Amiens.
[36] returns to the field for [37] after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Sehrou Guirassy of Amiens gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Marseille have a dangerous throw-in.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Marseille.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Amiens in their own half.
Amiens are coming forward and Thomas Monconduit gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Marseille goal kick.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Throw-in Amiens.
Ball safe as Amiens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amiens's Gael Kakuta gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Marseille defender.
Corner awarded to Amiens.
Amiens to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Francois Letexier awards Amiens a goal kick.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Amiens needs to be cautious. Marseille have an attacking throw-in.
Francois Letexier signals a Marseille throw-in in Amiens's half.
Dimitri Payet for Marseille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Amiens goal kick.
Free kick Marseille.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Amiens.
Thomas Monconduit for Amiens has been booked by Francois Letexier and receives a first yellow card.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
In Marseille, Dimitri Payet of Marseille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
In Marseille, Amiens push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Amiens.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Amiens to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Marseille.
Throw-in for Amiens at Orange Velodrome.
The first half has been concluded at Orange Velodrome.
Goal! Morgan Sanson gives Marseille a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Kevin Strootman to set up the goal.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick Amiens.
Amiens drives forward and Isaac Mbenza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Amiens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Amiens's half?
Throw-in Marseille.
Francois Letexier signals a Marseille throw-in in Amiens's half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Marseille.
Marseille pushes forward through Dimitri Payet, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marseille's Jordan Amavi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Amiens at Orange Velodrome.
Amiens are pushing forward but Fousseni Diabate's finish is wide of the goal.
Marseille have a goal kick.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Amiens have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Can Amiens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Marseille's half?
At Orange Velodrome, Amiens are penalized for being offside.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Dimitri Payet extends Marseille's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Morgan Sanson.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arturo Calabresi (Amiens) gets a yellow card.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Marseille just outside Amiens's area.
Dimitri Payet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Marseille.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
Throw-in for Amiens in their own half.
Luka Elsner (Amiens) is making a first substitution, with Chadrac Akolo replacing Isaac Mbenza.
Amiens are caught offside.
Ball safe as Amiens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Amiens's Gael Kakuta misses with an attempt on goal.
Francois Letexier awards Marseille a goal kick.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amiens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Attention is being given to Marseille’s Alvaro Gonzalez and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in Amiens.
Alexis Blin is replacing Thomas Monconduit for Amiens at Orange Velodrome.
Marseille's Alvaro Gonzalez is back in action after a slight knock.
Amiens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marseille will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Amiens.
Francois Letexier signals a throw-in for Amiens, close to Marseille's area.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Amiens.
The home team replace Bouna Sarr with Hiroki Sakai.
Francois Letexier awards the away team a throw-in.
Florian Thauvin is replacing Dimitri Payet for the home team.
Luka Elsner is making the team's third substitution at Orange Velodrome with Saman Ghoddos replacing Fousseni Diabate.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Amiens.
Free kick for Amiens in their own half.
Sehrou Guirassy keeps Amiens in contention with a penalty, making the score 2-1.
Amiens to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Amiens.
Amiens have been awarded a corner by Francois Letexier.
Sehrou Guirassy (Amiens) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Marseille to check on Nicholas Opoku, who is grimacing with pain.
Nicholas Opoku is back on the pitch.
Francois Letexier signals a free kick to Amiens in their own half.
Free kick Marseille.
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Amiens's half?
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Amiens in the half of Marseille.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Marseille.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Amiens.
Can Amiens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
Amiens drive upfield and [62] gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a [60] defender.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
Marseille make their third substitution with Maxime Lopez replacing Morgan Sanson.
Goal! Amiens go level at 2-2 through Saman Ghoddos in Marseille.
